page.title: 10EDUCATION IN FORDYCE
page.content:
=FORDYCE ACADEMY=
Our school used to be the very famous Fordyce Academy.P.7 pupils had to sit the "Eleven Plus" exam.& went to Banff Academy or Buckie High School for Language,Technical or Cookery Courses, to Macduff High for Secretarial or to Fordyce for Languages only.Once there were 100 pupils here,but this decreas- ed until in l964 the Secondary Dept. closed & the Primary moved over from the old building.Academy pupils wore a maroon blazer & badge with Fordyce Castle & motto "Praesis ut Prosis", meaning "Get on in life & help others" They also had a tie with maroon and blue stripes which we have revived for the Primary School.We have now only 44 pupils who move to Banff Academy, a comprehensive school,on completing P.7
